metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29581 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description:
Improper Update of Reference Count vulnerability in net/sched of LinuxKernel allows local attacker to cause privilege escalation to root. Thisissue affects: Linux Kernel versions prior to 5.18; version 4.14 and laterversions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-180-generic - 4.15.0-180.189~16.04.1
